description: This file provides a minimal stub implementation of a JsonRpcDirectLink class used for handling JSON-RPC direct links in the Thunder environment. It provides a default constructor, destructor, and an Invoke method that always returns an error indicating unavailability. Additionally, it includes a utility function to retrieve a Thunder controller client, which returns nullptr in this stub implementation.

classes.name: JsonRpcDirectLink
classes.description: A stub class representing a JSON-RPC direct link, providing an Invoke method that currently only indicates unavailability.

methods.name: JsonRpcDirectLink()
methods.description: Default constructor for the JsonRpcDirectLink class.

methods.name: Invoke(const string& method, const IN& params, OUT& response)
methods.description: Stub method to invoke a JSON-RPC method, always returning an error code indicating unavailability.

methods.name: GetThunderControllerClient(PluginHost::IShell* service, const string& callsign)
methods.description: Utility function that returns nullptr to indicate the Thunder controller client is unavailable in this build.

ctags.name: Invoke
ctags.pattern: /^        uint32_t Invoke(const string& \/*method*\/, const IN& \/*params*\/, OUT& \/*response*\/)$/
